content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”full_page_width” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1451675335363{margin-bottom: -35px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][layerslider_vc id=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1586498217892{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We strive to create high quality medical devices that meet the varying needs of our customers. Request a quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1585122161349{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73332″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581352796209{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

C-mount Video Adapters

Connect C-mount video cameras to microscopes and slit lamps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73338″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581354354590{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Digital Camera Adapters

Connect digital cameras to slit lamps and microscopes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73342″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/endoscope-couplers/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581354652864{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Endoscope Couplers

Connect C-mount video and digital cameras to endoscopes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1569437431409{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73345″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581356059018{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

CO₂ Laser Accessories

Micromanipulators, CO₂ handpieces, and laparoscope couplers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73349″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581356454733{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Fiberoptic Handpieces

Handpieces to be used with contact laser fibers in a wide variety of procedures.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73353″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/minimally-invasive-surgery/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581356753565{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Minimally Invasive Surgery

Re-usable, sterilizable suction/irrigation instruments.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1451746999255{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73356″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-cameras/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581356886276{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Medical Video Cameras

Options for cost effective and medical-grade C-mount video cameras.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73930″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/ppe/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1592587655622{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Personal Protective Equipment

Ensure the safety of your patients, employees, and yourself with medical grade PPE.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”73363″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/oem-products/” el_class=”zoom” css=”.vc_custom_1581357139002{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

OEM Products

Custom engineering, private labeling, and laser engraving on all of our products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444833000148{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#eeeeee” type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1451746323872{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1451773427166{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1451773435998{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

About

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

TTI Medical specializes in video and digital camera adaptation onto surgical microscopes, ophthalmic slit lamps, and endoscopes. In addition, we manufacture various CO₂ laser accessories, fiberoptic handpieces, and re-usable suction/irrigation instruments.
TTI Medical is a distributor of Ikegami and Sony medical video cameras for surgical microscopes & ophthalmic slit lamps in the United States. We are also distributors of personal protective equipment (PPE).

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1568664083853{margin-bottom: 75px !important;}”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_page_width_inner_container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1513592468743{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 55px !important;background-color: #1a1a1a !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1568758230875{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”#3c3c3c” type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1451746355599{margin-bottom: -20px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449529391432{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73560″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”top-to-bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1582245258966{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

I equipped 6 of my Haag Streit slit lamps with the TTI Medical LED illumination upgrade. Very pleased with the performance. Highly recommended at a great price.

William C. – MD[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449529401726{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73554″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”top-to-bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1582244914216{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

TTI Medical helped me attach a Canon DSLR camera to my Keeler slit lamp. Great problem solvers with great products.

Stefan T. – MD[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449529409953{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73556″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”top-to-bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1582245057709{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

I’ve used TTI Medical video camera adapters for over 10 years. Most recently to connect a 4K Ultra HD camera to my Zeiss microscope. Support you can count on.

James L. – MD[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449529426162{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73558″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” css_animation=”top-to-bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1582245132634{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Our company integrated the TTI Medical zoom coupler to our line of endoscopic video cameras. The couplers have 4K optical performance and our customers love the sharp video image.

Mukund J. – Director[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_separator color=”#3c3c3c” type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_page_width_inner_container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1568663953351{margin-bottom: 55px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;background-color: #63c3ce !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

TTI Medical was established in 1984 with the mission of designing and marketing high quality, technologically advanced surgical instruments and medical devices.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1584632294251{margin-top: -50px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

News

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”73822″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/news/ascrs-covid-19-update/”][vc_basic_grid post_type=”post” max_items=”1″ element_width=”12″ item=”71436″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1592587630108-b6f0dd70-9605-3″ taxonomies=”24″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1451746675472{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1451773467212{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1451773477891{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Contact

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

We’re always looking for new opportunities to better serve our customers.
If you don’t see what you need on our site contact us for a custom solution.

If you have any questions about our products please call +1 (925) 553-7828 or send us an e-mail.
Or, if you already know what product you’re looking for you can simply request a quote.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1578577105357{margin-right: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 65px !important;margin-left: 15px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;border-left-color: #eeeeee !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #eeeeee !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_id=”newsletter-signup”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449279899888{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513593880846{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Keep up to date — Sign up for our newsletter and follow us on social media

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1451746561576{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/4″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/4″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
